title: Bobby Gets Vulnerable...And Pays For It! + Caitlin Weighs In On 'Spooning' + Eddie's Uncomfortable Talk With His Son
itunes:title: Bobby Gets Vulnerable...And Pays For It! + Caitlin Weighs In On 'Spooning' + Eddie's Uncomfortable Talk With His Son
description:
Bobby opens up about 'spooning' in bed and how he likes to be the 'little spoon' sometimes. Eddie and Lunchbox make fun of him so Caitlin calls in to defend her man. Eddie’s son started playing an online video game recently and Eddie had to have a talk with him about the chat feature. Plus, new artist Parker McCollum stops by the studio to perform his debut single 'Pretty Heart' on 'The Friday Morning Conversation'!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
